Name: morerequests:bloodlust
Text:
Oh gosh, oh gee... This is embarrassing.
Here's the deal... I'm having some, shall we say, performance issues...
To put it bluntly, I just can't get into the same rage-induced bloodlusting battle frenzy that my brothers-in-arms do.
It's starting to make things awkward after we're all finished.
Please help.
